code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import io from'socket.io-client';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const socket=io('https://music-madness-project-backend.onrender.com',{transports:['websocket']});export default function App(){const[gameId,setGameId]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[alias,setAlias]=useState('');const[playlist,setPlaylist]=useState(['','','','','']);const handleCreateGame=()=>{socket.emit('createGame',{gameId,password});};const handleJoinGame=()=>{socket.emit('joinGame',{gameId,alias,password});};const handleSubmitPlaylist=()=>{socket.emit('submitPlaylist',{gameId,alias,playlist});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 max-w-xl mx-auto space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold",children:"Playlist Elimination Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:gameId,onChange:e=>setGameId(e.target.value),placeholder:"Game ID",className:"input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password",className:"input",type:"password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:alias,onChange:e=>setAlias(e.target.value),placeholder:"Your Alias",className:"input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCreateGame,className:"btn",children:"Create Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleJoinGame,className:"btn",children:"Join Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-semibold",children:"Your Playlist"}),playlist.map((song,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:song,onChange:e=>{const updated=[...playlist];updated[idx]=e.target.value;setPlaylist(updated);},placeholder:"Song ".concat(idx+1),className:"input"},idx)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmitPlaylist,className:"btn",children:"Submit Playlist"})]})]});}
